fields.headline: Teacher open evening - Thursday 22 January 2015
fields.bodyText: Teacher Open Evening Thursday 22 January 2015, 4.15-5.30pm Guardian Education Centre, Kings Place, London N1 If you are bringing (or thinking of bringing) a class to the Education Centre then why not come along to an open evening and find out more? You will receive an overview of the workshops and facilities we provide and gain the hands on experience of creating your own front page. The evening runs from 4:15pm until 5:30pm. Refreshments will be served on arrival. The session is free of charge but places are limited, and advance booking is essential. If you are interested in attending the open evening please email educationcentre@theguardian.com or phone 020 3353 3306/7. The Education Centre programme: Primary school workshops Secondary school workshops Q&A for university groups Teacher conferences and seminars Family activities Resources for teachers
